main.name: Dilshad Raza

main.bio: I am Dilshad Raza, a Geologist, Self Learned Data Scientist. I am motivated to work with the company that can help me acheive my goal while in which I can add value to. I am a Team Player, Cooperative, Acheiver, and a Believer. I do believe with consistent hardwork and passion, anything can be acheived.
